parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofpr

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.75

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns current level of ability of a unit, in range between 0 and 1, 1 being the highest level of skill.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''skill''' unitName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> unitName [[skill]] skillName (since <template><title>GVI</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part></template> or <template><title>GVI</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part></template>)

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> skillName: [[String]] - Possible values are:
* aimingAccuracy
* aimingShake
* aimingSpeed
* endurance
* spotDistance
* spotTime
* courage
* reloadSpeed
* commanding
* general

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_skill = [[skill]] unit1;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_myCourage = [[player]] [[skill]] "courage"</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[skillFinal]], [[setSkill]], [[setUnitAbility]], [[Arma 3 AI Skill]], [[ArmA: AI Combat Modes|AI Combat Modes]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dt class="note">Unknown</dt>
<dd class="note">Skill of AI units set via the slider in unit placement screen varies from 0.2 to 1.0. <br>
If superAI is enabled all units have skill of 1.0 regardless of the skill slider

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>

[[Category:AI]]
